About Somiibo

A company turning ideas into beautiful things

Why Somiibo?

Somiibo was made from the heart and from the perspective of a user. Moreover, Somiibo was designed by marketers, for marketers.

As mentor and strategists, we saw such a significant number of business visionaries attempting to utilize online social networking to develop their organizations, brands, and online presence. We saw a need to offer a service that would help people manage their social media at a high level regardless of whether they have a full team of marketers or not.

This is why a social media bot is so important.

For $0 a month, Somiibo users get literally dozens of curated tools to use via a powerful and light-weight software and a weekly dose of informative blog posts on how to utilize web-based social networking tips.

Here are some awesome uses for Somiibo

  • Get more SoundCloud plays and followers
  • Get more followers on Instagram
  • Get more points on YouLikeHits and AddMeFast
  • Manage your social media accounts while connected to multiple proxies
  • You can run multiple bots at the same time!
